title: Does anyone know when is the next sale for leona?
body: I play Leona for the first time and thought she is a very good choice for support so I want to buy her but I want to wait for a sale just wondering does anyone knows when is a sale for Leona?

replies.body: We don't have any information to share on sales until they've been announced.  Any updates will be provided at our [Sales ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales)page.  I hope that sheds some light for you.  :D
